tool_description: Determines optimal reorder points for products by combining demand forecasts, lead times, and safety stock requirements.

demand_during_lead_time_variability.description: Variability of demand during lead time period

error_messages: Invalid demand value: daily_demand must be greater than 0.
Invalid lead time: lead_time_days must be greater than 0.
Negative safety stock: safety_stock must be non-negative.
Invalid variability: demand_during_lead_time_variability must be non-negative.
usage: Provide daily demand, lead time, and safety stock to calculate when to reorder. The tool accounts for demand variability during lead time for more accurate reorder points.

lead_time_demand.description: Expected demand during lead time period

buffer_adequacy.description: Assessment of safety stock adequacy level
